        public GameController​(Player player,
                      int nbAI,
                      Stock s,
                      Discard d,
                      Rule rule,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Rule> rules)
        Basic constructor of the class
        Parameters:
        player - The real player of the game
        nbAI - The number of AI in the game
        s - The Stock of the game
        d - The discard of the game
        rule - The rule of the game
        rules - The differents rules of the game

      • changeRule

        public void changeRule​(int index)
                throws InvalidActionException
        Method that change the current rule of the game, depending of the index
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the new rule
        Throws:
        InvalidActionException - if the index is invalid or if there is an action in the listActionToDo.
